elementSpec.desc: contains text displayed in tabular form, in rows and columns.

attDef.desc: indicates the number of rows in the table.
attDef.valDesc: If no number is supplied, an application must calculate the number of rows.

attDef.desc: indicates the number of columns in each row of the table.
attDef.valDesc: If no number is supplied, an application must calculate the number of columns.

elementSpec.desc: contains one row of a table.
contains one cell of a table.
contains a mathematical or other formula.

attDef.desc: supplies the name of a previously defined notation used for the content of the element.
attDef.valDesc: The name of a formal notation previously declared in the document type declaration.

elementSpec.desc: contains a block containing graphics, illustrations, or figures.
contains a brief prose description of the appearance or content of a graphic figure, for use when documenting an image without displaying it.
